reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the collection and use of information from users.
reply.reference: We collect and use the following information from you for the purposes set forth in the “How Do We Use Your Information” section of this Policy. URL: https://mobile.journeypureexpress.com/privacypolicy.html

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Contact Information, Business Information, User Account Information, and Technical Data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the different types of data the app collects, including Contact Information, Business Information, User Account Information, and Technical Data.
reply.reference: Contact Information | When you use the App, we may ask you for your name, telephone number, email address, or other contact details. Depending on the context in which we collect this information, this information may be PHI. Business Information | When you register your facility for an account in the App, we collect your facility name, phone number, and address. We also collect the name of the individuals creating the registration and establishing accounts. User Account Information | In order to access and use the App, you must first complete a registration. When you create an account with us, we collect (1) your name, (2) your address; (3) your organization’s name, as applicable; and (4) your username and password. Technical Data | When you use the App, we automatically collect information from your mobile device, which may include...

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users can manage, change, limit, or delete their information by submitting requests via the Contact Information details provided in the policy, indicating that users can opt-out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: If you would like to manage, change, limit, or delete other information or if you no longer want to receive any email, postal mail, or telephone contact from us in the future, such requests may be submitted via the Contact Information details at the end of this Policy. URL: https://mobile.journeypureexpress.com/privacypolicy.html

stored with all local data. Data transfers between the App and our database (via the synchronization process) are always encrypted using a 256-bit TLS certificate. The security token contained in the data is further encrypted using a 128-bit AES cypher. From time to time, we review our security procedures to consider appropriate new technology and methods.

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with service providers that need access to user information to provide operational or other support services on the app's behalf.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies that the app may share user information with service providers for various operational and support services.
reply.reference: Service Providers | We may share your information with our service providers that need access to your information to provide operational or other support services on our behalf. Among other things, service providers may help us to administer the App; support our provision of services requested by you; provide technical support; send marketing, promotions and communications to you about our services; and assist with other legitimate purposes permitted by law. URL: https://mobile.journeypureexpress.com/privacypolicy.html
